title: Average value of a rational function

content.question: What is the average value of <math> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>cos</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </math> on the closed interval <math> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>[</mo> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mo>,</mo> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> <mo>]</mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math>?

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
